input.sentences: we attended a new year 's party at [male] and [female] 's home .
we took a selfie to capture the evening and remember the fun we had .
[male] reluctantly agreed to wear a happy new year 's hat ; however | [female] loved acting goofy and wearing the hat and sunglasses .
i had to snap a quick picture of [female] | as she was trying to avoid my camera all evening .
we partied until almost 2 am | and the hosts ensured that all the couples got their new year 's photo taken before going home .
